title: Isakson, Perdue Vote to Stop Federal Funding for ?Sanctuary Cities? (Johnny Isakson)
text: ( Source : Johnny Isakson ) WASHINGTON - U.S. Senators Johnny Isakson, R-Ga., and David Perdue, R-Ga., today voted to stop federal funds from going to cities or states that ignore federal immigration laws and harbor illegal immigrants. The
